text: Even while operating on small tests the control f find feature is extremely slow and sometimes freezes jmeter. I have noticed this with version 2.1.3 in general.
creator: c.andersen2012@gmail.com

text:
Hi,
Have you modified  this property to enable undo/redo:
undo.history.size

Thanks
creator: support@ubikloadpack.com
c.andersen2012@gmail.com
text: Yes I have. I believe that I have this set to 25 as the stack size.

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Hi,
this is a known issue, that's why undo/redo is disabled by default.

Closing as duplicate.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 57043 ***
